trans-unit.source: Provides a page adapter for the cHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um adaptador de página para o conjunto de adaptador cHTML.

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Os adaptadores, normalmente, são construídos automaticamente pelo ASP.NET e tem de ter um construtor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: Cria e devolve um escritor de texto adequado para os adaptadores indicados.

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: Escritor de texto adequado para os adaptadores indicados.

trans-unit.source: Called to determine the postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para determinar a recolha de dados nova colocação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object that contains request information, such as HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref> objeto que contém informações de pedidos, tais como cabeçalhos HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: Identificador da origem de evento.

trans-unit.source: Argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de argumento para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: Recolha de dados nova colocação do objeto pedido.

trans-unit.source: A modified version of the baseCollection parameter.
trans-unit.target: Uma versão modificada do baseCollection parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: Avalia se se aplica o conjunto de adaptador de dispositivo para o pedido especificado.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The device capability of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|N/A|
trans-unit.target: | Classe | Devolve | Tipo de composição de preferencial | Verifique o valor da propriedade de JavaScript | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Verifica se o valor de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>é <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>ou <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | Devolve o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `true`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Verifica se o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>é <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>ou <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | Devolve a capacidade de dispositivo do <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `false`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Verifica se o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>é <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>ou <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>. | N/A|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: O contexto do pedido atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o adaptador de dispositivo definida aplica-se o pedido especificado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the header associated with postbacks.
trans-unit.target: Compõe o cabeçalho associado novas colocações.

trans-unit.source: For browsers that support script, this includes a script block to perform postback.
trans-unit.target: Para browsers que suportam o script, isto inclui um bloco de script para executar a nova colocação.
